Strings.Text: It's a terminal for controlling all \nthe survaillence cameras in the {pause}{clear}facility.{pause}
Personal belongings of the \nsecurity guards are organized. {pause}{clear}The cardboard boxes have \nbecome soft from absorbing all {pause}{clear}the moisture in the air.{pause}
A heavy coat is hanging. It is \ncovered with a thick layer of {pause}{clear}dust. It appears that coats are \nunnecessary in this world.{pause}
The data cards for the research \nstaff are neatly organized.{pause}
Entertainment and amusement \nitems are stored here.{pause}{clear}Magazines, game systems, and \nprotein bottles can be observed.{pause}
Everything on the desk is \ncovered with dust.{pause}
Everything on the desk is \ncovered with dust.{pause}
Everything on the desk is \ncovered with dust.{pause}

On the whiteboard there is a 
notice. “Computers for data {pause}{clear}acquisition of the experiment will 
arrive next week from the {pause}{clear}Military Facility. Those members 
who are on the experiment team {pause}{clear}should contact Lieutenant Wolf.”{pause}
It's a compact server for data \ncontrol. It must have broken {pause}{clear}from all the humidity with the \nroom being shut for a long time.{pause}
There are many other repair items \nnear the tool box.{pause}

The daily logs taken by the 
security guards are scattered {pause}{clear}everywhere. According to the 
records, for a while after their {pause}{clear}arrival to this world, there were 
no dinosaurs seen. But from a {pause}{clear}few years ago smaller sized 
dinosaurs started to appear {pause}{clear}around the area. Since then it 
seems as though the {pause}{clear}experimental activities had 
decreased.{pause}
{pic}She is struggling to get out of \nthe hand cuffs.{delay 28742}
She is staring this way with a \nbullish look.{pause}
